PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Developer
Sr. Developer
Tech Lead
Sr. Developer
Sr. Developer
Sr. Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Responsible for ratio calculations as part of Rebate calculations occurs on monthly basis. Using .Net, SQL server and SSIS packages developed Windows applications, Batch Process, Stored Procedures and Daily batches has been implemented to do GPR/BPR calculations. Designed & Developed web interface for One Stop Secondary using ASP.Net. Validated the data (results) manually and implemented stored procedures for automation purpose of validations.
Responsibilities:
Implemented the business rules at application levels for better flow on GPR and BPR calculations using T-SQL and Stored Procedures; developed technical/application levers for easy start and stop of calculations. Coordinate with Sales team in reviewing the Ratio Calculations and provided assistance in exporting the data to Excel. Developed Windows Application that packages the individual calculations and creates Excel files for GPR/BPR Calculations, using Win Forms, C# and Excel. Developed Interfaces, web pages using ASP.Net for registering the clients for One Stop Secondary, GPR/BPR calculations. Designed and developed custom controls and implemented them at web interfaces to interact with multiple Databases using C#, ADO.Net. Developed and modified SQL Stored Procedures in automating the calculated process for GPR/BPR. Developed SSIS package in sending Emails for newly/updated PHC info to business management; as part of weekly updates to SQL Server 2005 database. Developed SQL views at Oracle database to get PHC information for integration with SQL Server database. Developed SQL triggers in implementing flags when primary health care provider got changed using PL/SQL. Developed and modified Stored Procedures in connection with MRS report fixes and deployed at SQL Server 2005 database using T-SQL. Involved in Source Code Testing, unit testing, integration testing and system testing. Worked on version control systems Visual Source Safe (VSS) for checkout and check-in of .Net work files.
Environment:
MS Visual Studio 2003, ASP.Net 1.1 & 2.0, C#, IIS, HTML, Java Script, ADO.Net, TOAD, MS SQL Server 2005, Crystal Reports XI, SSIS, MS Visual SourceSafe and Windows 2003/XP.

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Designed & Developed Web Services for Duke Components, and Consumed Web Services to provide interaction from outside Duke Framework. Using .Net, SQL Server techniques, Web Applications, Windows Applications, batch process and SSIS packages were developed for managing Learning Management System; one of the major duke application. Worked as Support Analyst as part of team which committed to support Duke Applications on 24/7 basis.
Responsibilities:
Developed utility based components for handling errors, logs, configurations and sending emails; and used these utilities in rest of framework components using C#, XML and .Net Framework. Designed and developed XSL Transformations based on Schemas (XSD files) for implementing XML transfers using XSLT, XSD and XPath. Developed Windows Application as batch process designed to consume SOAP authenticated Web Services outside Duke and posting the data to SQL Server. Developed SSIS packages in implementing the ETL process; as part of daily updates to SQL Server 2005 database. Implemented SSIS package that consumes web service and then posts the data to SQL Server 2005 database over Web Service. Developed and modified Stored Procedures in connection with MRS report fixes and deployed at SQL Server 2005 database using T-SQL. Designed and developed reports for site admins /directors for monthly estimates, employee tracking, and Course/Session tracking for all employees using MRS Reports. Developed Alert applications for continuous monitoring on Web Services from third party and from duke using C#. Developed unit test cases derived under UML Model / EA diagram and implemented at .Net source code using NUnit. Involved in Source Code Testing, unit testing, integration testing and system testing of LMS framework. Developed document scripts for the framework components using NDOC and also provided support documents for all developments. Worked on version control systems Visual Source Safe (VSS) for checkout and check-in of .Net work files.
Environment: Duke Framework, LMS Framework, MS Visual Studio 2005, ASP.Net 1.1 & 2.0, C#, XSD, XML, XSLT, XML Spy, IIS, HTML, VB Script, Java Script, XPath, ADO.Net, Web Services, MS SQL Server 2005, SSIS, MRS reports, Enterprise Architect 6.0, MS Visual SourceSafe and Windows 2000/XP.

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Worked on Commercial Mortgage group applications under multi-layered architecture for Asset Administration team, designed and developed an application that handles life cycle of transactions of various types. Analyzing requirements and turned them into use cases for easy roll-out to development. Developed front-end screens, programs/modules with VB.Net, ASP pages also wrote queries, modules and custom functions at MS Access.
Responsibilities: Interacted with business users in gathering requirements and provide proto-types to them for clear understanding of system. Developed Use Cases for converting the business needs into technical requirements. Involved in architectural design for providing dynamic reports based on custom needs of reporting from business and for providing the views the list items using VB.Net and Infragistics tools. Designed and implemented the module to get the latest/updated report from web server based on dynamic needs of business users using VB.Net and XML. Designed and developed ASP pages to send/post the data as XML through response/Request objects using VB Script. Designed and developed various user controls like tabbed controls, multi page controls for best view of filters using VB.Net. Responsible for coding several class modules in getting the data to datasets and binding to front end controls using VB.Net. Developed user interfaces using various bound controls and validation controls in making validation interfaces. Designed and developed Custom Functions for various calculations and procedures in Ms Access 2003. Provided support to the business in administering the users, managing dynamic reports and application configuration and issues.
Environment: MS Visual Studio 2003, VB.Net, ASP, MS Access, MS SQL Server 2000, XSD, XML, XSLT, WordML, XML Spy, IIS, HTML, XPath, ADO.Net, Web Services, Crystal Reports 9, .NET Assemblies, MS Visual SourceSafe, VB Script, Java Script and Windows 2000.

PositionHistory.Title: Developer
PositionHistory.Description: Worked on CA Web Interface, an interaction for Corporate Accounting people for Loan Approvals, for estimating of Interest and point the calculations. Developed user interfaces using various bound controls and validation controls in making validation interfaces under Service Oriented Architecture (SOA). Environment: Visual Studio 6.0, Classic ASP, Visual Basic 6.0, MS SQL Server 2000, IIS, HTML, XML, XPath, ADO, Web Services, Crystal Reports 9, .NET Assemblies, .Net User Controls, COM+, VB Script, Java Script, Clear Case, MS Visual SourceSafe and Windows 2000.

PositionHistory.Title: Developer
PositionHistory.Description: As part of WFS (Wells Fargo Services) team, highly involved in the enterprise team meetings to discuss & share better methodologies/ techniques to make the whole team a successful team. Handled Project is Defect Tracking Standardization; which manages the defects for different projects and/or applications based releases. Environment: MS Visual Studio, Visual Basic, Classic ASP, ADO, SOAP, XML, XSL, T-SQL, MS SQLServer2000, Oracle 8i, Crystal Reports 7.0, MS Visual SourceSafe and Windows2000.

PositionHistory.Title: Developer
PositionHistory.Description: Worked as Developer as part of D&B Data collection Team; developed the customer module for processing the statuses, which includes activation and installation of services to customer. Implemented projects are Consumer Information Management & Reporting System, ICW and ABUS. Environment: Visual Basic 6.0, Crystal Reports 7.0, Excel Object Library, ADO, OLEDB, T-SQL, SQL Server 2000, MS-Access, MS - Excel and Windows 2000.

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Handled Projects are Health Care System and Patient Care System, as part of provided solutions for West Lion Hospitals. Designed & developed the data access layer for proper database interactions and developed back end procedures for both clients.
Environment: Visual Basic 6.0, T-SQL, SQL Server 6.0, Crystal Reports 6.0 and Windows NT.

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: team, successfully implemented Digital Heart and Digital acquisition system for Cardiology requirements. While using 3rd party Active X tools best practices were implemented with good technical assessment. Implemented project is digital acquisition system for CATHLAB. Designed and developed AVI to DICOM conversion program. Designed and Implemented Image capturing programs for Mutech grabber card, Foresight Imaging I-1000 through dlls, MFC. Environment: Visual C++ 6.0, Visual Basic 6.0, ADO 2.0, Crystal Reports 6.0, Victor Image Processing tools, MS Access and Windows NT.

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: Case Module and Drug Index modules were successfully implemented. My Role involved as a software engineer, specifically in Coding, debugging and integration phases. Designed & developed the front-end screens that interact with database, using Visual Basic and Oracle. Environment: Visual Basic 5.0/4.0, RDO, DAO, Oracle, Ms Access, Windows NT and Windows95/98.

CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Visual Studio 6.0 and Enterprise 6.0 and Enterprise

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Prasad Karanam has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 16 years. Currently he is employed as a Sr. Developer at FannieMae. Prasad has extensive knowledge of Microsoft C-SHARP, Visual Basic .NET, Microsoft .NET Technology, XML, Windows Communiciation Foundation, Web Services, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, Microsoft ASP.NET, Microsoft Transact-SQL, MS Visual SourceSafe, Microsoft SQL Server, Visual Basic, Seagate Crystal Reports, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, Microsoft Access, ADO, LINQ, Microsoft Excel, Stored Procedures, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Windows Presentation Foundation, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, JavaScript, Active Server Pages, XSLT, XML Schema, SQL Server Integration Services, Oracle PL/SQL, Microsoft Visual C/C++, XPath, WinForms, VBScript, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, HTML, COM+, ActiveX, Service Oriented Architecture, SQL, SOAP, Oracle 10G, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, Microsoft Visual Studio, XSL, Visual Basic for Applications, VSS, UML/OMT, TOAD, Rational ClearCase, Oracle 8i, N-Tier, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft DOS, GUI Applications, Framework, ETL, Apache Subversion, Agile Methodology, WordML, Web Adapters, Visual Basic 6, Request, Relational Database, Rational ClearQuest, RDO, Oracle Report, Oracle Applications, Oracle 9i, Oracle 11g, Open Span 4.5, OLE DB, NUnit, Microsoft Message Queue (MSMQ), Microsoft Foundation Classes, Mercury Quality Center, MS Excel VBA, MRS Reports, Java, Delegates, Data Access Object, DAL, AJAX Tool Kit, AJAX. Prasad has a considerable management experience (2.3 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2010-01 for 28 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Tech Lead at Capital One Home Loans.
